item.title: Deploy Node.js to Heroku
item.description: I used the folder “Desktop/restful” as my REST API folder. First, create a free Heroku account. Then, create a new app “morning67890” on Heroku. Download the Heroku Command Line Interface(CLI) 1 $ brew install heroku/brew/heroku I copyed all files of my RESTAPI from my old RESTAPI folder to the folder “Desktop/restful”. Under “Desktop/restful” folder: 1 $ heroku login Check node version: 1 $ node --version The noder version shoulde be higher than 10.
